This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS writing-mode initial value 
PASS writing-mode: vertical-rl 
PASS writing-mode: vertical-lr 
PASS writing-mode should inherit 
PASS writing-mode: horizontal-tb 
PASS writing-mode: initial 
PASS writing-mode: inherit 
PASS writing-mode: horizontal-tb; writing-mode: inherit 
PASS writing-mode: foo 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
